comments:
Try to preview the following report with a meter chart group on the Y series, 
it fails. It used to work before, this is a regression.

An exception is thrown 
org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException: Can not plot meter series with 
null or non-numeric datapoint.
	at org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.DialRenderer.<init>(DialRenderer.java:132)
	at org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.Dial.compute(Dial.java:98)
	at org.eclipse.birt.chart.factory.Generator.build(Generator.java:759)
Fixed. Using the first valid data to render the meter chart, only if all data are invalid, exception will be thrown.

traces.message: Can not plot meter series with  null or non-numeric datapoint.
